availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Camp Hamilton, Ohio on May 8, 1861. Mustered out of service June 7, 1864. Commanding officer(s): Robert L. McCook and Gustav Kammerling.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 177-179.
Constantin Grebner,”We Were The Ninth:” A History of the Ninth Regiment, Ohio Volunteer Infantry, April 17, 1861, to June 7, 1864”, trans. Frederic Trautmann, (Kent, OH: The Kent State University Press, 1987), xi, xxi-xxv, 11-17, 178, 198, 200.
